prompt_base: cinematic portrait of an extremely muscular Japanese man, fierce expression, spiky golden-yellow energy hair, wearing a torn orange and blue martial arts gi
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, hyperdetailed human skin texture, individual golden hair strands visible, dynamic shadows, realistic fabric weave on gi
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, plastic texture, smooth plastic hair, bright yellow hair, flat color, CGI, blurry background, low quality, childish, oversaturated
